items.sentence: Will Ashton betray me when we are playing football.
I drink water on a daily basis.
Things decay over time, when they are not cleaned.
Artifacts are on display at a museum.
I will entertain Emiline by playing with her.
I like rain more than hail.
I maintain focus while being very sleepy in school.
Mommy gets a lot of praise for her teaching.
I participate in a relay race at school.
I remain calm when there is a fire drill.
I sustain my pace when swimming long distances.
A traitor is not a good person.
A waterway is a place where water flows.
Yesterday I had fun at field day.
My second toe is my longest toe.
A car can tow a trailer.
I really like playing football at school.
